title: Zelenskyy is back in Trump's good books as the U.S. pushes for peace in Ukraine
short_opening: The last time Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy was in the Oval Office he endured one of the most humiliating_diplomatic disputes ever captured on camera as he was chewed out by his American counterpart and dressed down for not dressing up. This time, he left with Trump floating American security guarantees if a peace deal is reached.
label: Media Representation

title: Zelenskyy fires security chief, top prosecutor over treason concerns within their departments
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy fired the head of the country's security service and its prosecutor general on Sunday, citing hundreds of criminal proceedings into treason and collaboration by people within their departments.
label: Domestic Governance

title: Zelensky asks G7 leaders for better air defences and tougher sanctions on Russia
short_opening: The ongoing war in Ukraine moved from being a_distant, abstract_conflict to something more tangible for_the leaders of the world's seven wealthiest democracies_on Monday with an address by the embattled country's president.
label: Aid Policies

title: Russian forces now control Severodonetsk, but Zelensky vows Ukraine will re-take lost cities
short_opening: Russian forces_seized full control of the Eastern Ukrainian city of Severodonetsk_on Saturday, confirming_Kyiv's biggest battlefield setback for more than a month,_after_weeks of some of the war's bloodiest fighting.
label: Military Operations

title: Information can land 'bigger blow' than weapons, Ukrainian President Zelensky tells Canadian students
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky told university students across Canada via video link Wednesday that his_country remains committed to democracy nearly four months after Russia invaded.
label: Russia-Related Rhetoric

title: How Volodymyr Zelensky has rallied Ukraine, night after night, during 100 days of war
short_opening: One hundred days into a Russian invasion, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky is speaking to his people every night and rallying them to the continued fight to expel the invading forces from within Ukraine's borders.
label: Media Representation

title: Russia currently occupying about 20% of Ukraine, Zelensky says
short_opening: Russia tightened its grip on a key target in a battle for control of Ukraine's eastern Donbas region while Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky pleaded for more Western arms to help Ukraine reach a battlefield "inflection point" and prevail in the war.
label: Military Operations

title: Impose 'maximum' sanctions on Russia, Ukraine's Zelensky urges World Economic Forum
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky_called for 'maximum' sanctions against Russia during speech to the World Economic Economic in Davos, Switzerland.
label: Russia-Related Rhetoric

title: Russia waging 'total war' in Ukraine, says Zelensky
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky says Russia is waging "total war" on his country, and that includes inflicting as many casualties and destroying as much infrastructure as possible.
label: Russia-Related Rhetoric

title: Zelensky hopeful Ukraine's forces making progress as battle for the Donbas rages
short_opening: In his nightly address Friday, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said no one can predict how long the war will last but that his country's forces have been making progress, including retaking six Ukrainian towns or villages in the past day.
label: Military Operations

title: Ukraine needs more weapons to unblock siege of Mariupol, Zelensky says
short_opening: A roundup of events on Day 76 of Russia's invasion of Ukraine: Official says bodies of 44 civilians found in rubble of building in northeastern city of Izyum; Lithuania votes to recognize genocide; and the United Nations estimates the civilian death toll is much higher than records show.
label: Aid Policies

title: Top U.S. officials meet with Zelensky in Ukraine as Russia continues to pound targets
short_opening: The U.S. secretaries of state and defence met Sunday night with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky in the highest-level visit to the war-torn country's capital by an American delegation since the start of Russia's invasion.
label: Diplomatic Engagements

title: Ukraine's Zelensky accuses Russian troops of mass civilian killings, coverup in Mariupol
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said new evidence is emerging that shows Russian troops killed tens of thousands of civilians in Mariupol and then tried to cover it up.
label: Russia-Related Rhetoric

title: Zelensky calls Russian army 'inhuman' as Moscow increases attacks on eastern Donbas
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky says_the Russian military is throwing everything it has at Ukraine, with most of its combat-ready forces now concentrated in the country and just across its border in Russia.
label: Russia-Related Rhetoric

title: Russia launches 'battle for the Donbas' in Eastern Ukraine, Zelensky says
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky says Russia has begun its offensive to take control of Eastern Ukraine.
label: Military Operations

title: Russia's siege of Mariupol could 'put an end' to negotiations, Zelensky says
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky told Ukrainian media that the continuing siege of Mariupol could scuttle any attempts to find a negotiated end to the war._The president's office said the southern port city is holding out but the situation is critical.
label: Diplomatic Engagements

title: At least 2,500 Ukrainian troops have died since Russia invaded, Zelensky says
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky_said Friday that between 2,500 and 3,000 Ukrainian troops have died in the war with Russia and another 10,000 have been injured.
label: Military Operations

title: Polish, Baltic presidents meet Zelensky in Ukraine, pledge continued support and military aid
short_opening: The presidents of four countries on Russia's doorstep visited Ukraine on Wednesday and underscored their support for the embattled country, where they saw heavily damaged buildings and demanded accountability for what they called war crimes carried out by Russian forces.
label: Diplomatic Engagements

title: Zelensky says next few days of war are crucial as Ukraine braces for new Russian offensive
short_opening: Ukrainian_President Volodymyr Zelensky warned his nation Sunday night that the coming week would be as crucial as any in the war, adding in his nightly address that he expects Russian troops to "move to even larger operations in the east of our state."
label: Military Operations

title: 'Tortured' Ukraine wants peace with Russia despite atrocities, says Zelensky
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Saturday that he is committed to pressing for peace despite Russian attacks on civilians that have stunned the world, and he renewed his plea for countries to send more weapons ahead of an expected surge in fighting in the country's east.
label: Diplomatic Engagements

title: Russian troops committing worst atrocities since Second World War, Zelensky tells UN
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky_told the UN_Security Council on Tuesday that the Russian military must be brought to justice immediately for war crimes, accusing the Kremlin's troops of the worst atrocities since the Second World War.
label: Russia-Related Rhetoric

title: Zelensky accuses Russia of torture and 'genocide' after bodies of civilians found
short_opening: Moscow faced a new wave of revulsion and accusations of war crimes Monday after the Russian pullout from the outskirts of Kyiv revealed streets strewn with corpses of what appeared to be civilians, some seemingly killed deliberately at close range.
label: Russia-Related Rhetoric

title: Silk Sonic and Jon Batiste triumph, Zelensky appears at a classy Grammy Awards
short_opening: The 64th Grammy Awards was a classy affair that awarded first-time winners and offered lively, well-produced performances _ plus a message from Ukraine's president. CBC News has the highlights.
label: Media Representation

title: Ukraine president Zelensky asks for help in Grammys video
short_opening: Ukrainian president Volodymyr Zelensky appeared in a video message at the Grammy Awards to ask for support in telling the story of Ukraine's invasion by Russia.
label: Media Representation

title: Zelensky alleges Russian troops leaving booby traps behind as Ukraine regains area near Kyiv
short_opening: Ukrainian troops moved cautiously to retake territory north of the country's capital on Saturday, using cables to pull the bodies of civilians off the streets in one town out of fear that Russian forces might have booby-trapped them before leaving.
label: Military Operations

title: Russian forces still attacking Kyiv as Ukraine takes back some areas, says Zelensky
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky_said late Monday that Russian forces are still attacking Kyiv, despite being driven out of Irpin, a suburb northwest of the capital that has seen heavy fighting.
label: Military Operations

title: Russia wants to 'create North and South Korea in Ukraine,' Ukrainian military official says
short_opening: President Volodymyr Zelensky said on Sunday that_Ukraine is willing to become neutral and compromise over the status of the Donbas region as part of a peace deal.
label: Russia-Related Rhetoric

title: 'Make yourselves visible and heard': Zelensky calls for more shows of support for Ukraine
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky_is calling_on people around the world to come out in their city squares and streets and stand with Ukraine and against the Russian invasion.
label: Media Representation

title: Ukraine's Zelensky says siege of Mariupol 'a terror that will be remembered for centuries to come'
short_opening: Russian forces pushed deeper into Ukraine's besieged and battered port city of Mariupol on Saturday, where heavy fighting shut down a major steel plant and local authorities pleaded for more Western help.
label: Russia-Related Rhetoric

title: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky addresses Parliament as Russian forces edge toward Kyiv
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky delivered a powerful, personal appeal to Canada to do more to help his embattled country withstand the invasion by Russia.
label: Diplomatic Engagements

title: Volodymyr_Zelensky to address House of Commons
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr_Zelensky_has accepted an invitation to address the House of Commons just a few days after delivering an address to the British House of Commons.
label: Media Representation

title: Trudeau promises surveillance gear to Ukraine, invites Zelensky to address Parliament
short_opening: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, who is visiting Germany, has told Ukraine's president that Canada is sending cameras for surveillance drones to help Ukrainian forces track the Russian military, a source with knowledge of the file says.
label: Aid Policies

title: Zelensky describes Russian attack as 'pure Nazi behaviour' in appeal to American Jews
short_opening: Ukrainian President_Volodymr Zelensky appealed to American Jews for support on_Monday with an unsparing account of Russian destruction in his_country that he compared to the Nazi German army marching across_Europe.
label: Russia-Related Rhetoric

title: 'Prove that you are with us,' Ukraine's president says to EU
short_opening: Speaking via video link to an emergency session of the European Parliament, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky urged the EU on Tuesday to "prove that you are with us" in Ukraine's war with Russia, a day after Kyiv officially asked to join the bloc.
label: Russia-Related Rhetoric

title: As Russia attacks Ukraine on multiple fronts, some fear Zelensky's government is next target
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky says he is staying put in Kyiv even with Russian troops just 25 kilometers from the capital. An analyst says Russia could be looking to eliminate anyone who could potentially mount opposition to a Russian-installed regime.
label: Military Operations

title: Ignore 'apocalyptic predictions' on possible Russia invasion, urges Ukraine foreign minister
short_opening: President Volodymyr Zelensky said a week ago that Ukraine was not a sinking Titanic and accused Washington and the media of fuelling panic that weighed on the economy when there were "no tanks in the streets."
label: Russia-Related Rhetoric

title: Trudeau, Ukrainian president talk sanctions, extending training mission to deter Russian military
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and Prime Minister Justin Trudeau today discussed extending Canada's military training mission and the prospect_of more_sanctions on Moscow as Russian troops conducted a live fire exercise on Ukraine's_border.
label: Diplomatic Engagements
